description: Describes the specified attribute of the specified VPC. You can specify only one attribute at a time.

nested_items.name: EnableDnsHostnames
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the instances launched in the VPC get DNS hostnames. If this attribute is true, instances in the VPC get DNS hostnames; otherwise, they do not.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The attribute value. The valid values are true or false.

nested_items.name: EnableDnsSupport
nested_items.description: Indicates whether DNS resolution is enabled for the VPC. If this attribute is true, the Amazon DNS server resolves DNS hostnames for your instances to their corresponding IP addresses; otherwise, it does not.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The attribute value. The valid values are true or false.

nested_items.name: EnableNetworkAddressUsageMetrics
nested_items.description: Indicates whether Network Address Usage metrics are enabled for your VPC.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The attribute value. The valid values are true or false.
